name: SMC Micro Prusik Minding Double NFPA Pulley
categories: Micro Prusik Minding Double NFPA Pulley
description: A small prusik-minding, double pulley, great for rescue or hauling, with 2 sheaves that allow you to double your mechanical advantage.Aluminum, with anodized aluminum side plates.Large top hole takes a rescue carabiner.Prusik-minding side plate design is great for hauling.Efficient sealed ballbearing sheaves.Low-profile side plate fasteners eliminate hooking up.1.4in. (3cm) sheave, 1in. (2.5cm) thread diameter.Rope size up to 12mm (use 6 to 8mm prusiks).NFPA rated L for lightweight use.Minimum breaking strength is 22kN.
